name: Signature Master
description:
Handwritten Signature is often regarded as a form of art.

Yet, different people have very different signatures.

Challenge yourself in this game to reproduce the signatures.

--== Features ==--

- Multiple episodes of fun and challenging signatures for you to try out.
- We keep updating new episodes every month.


--== How To Play ==--

- Draw the signature displayed on the top right corner".
- Lift finger from screen and wait for 2 seconds when done.
- Try to match the shape and the height-to-width ratio of the image as quickly as possible to achieve high scores.
- You can tap on the target image to enlarge to see more clearly.
- You need an overall score above 50.0 in order to proceed to the next level.

Note: All signatures are created by our artists and developers.
